nodes.documentation: Modifier for functions only smart contract owner(admin) can run.
nodes.name: system

nodes.documentation: Modifier to verify that device (caller) is registered to this contract.
nodes.name: isRegistered

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to verify that device (caller) belongs to a house.
Premise: isRegistered() returns true.
nodes.name: belongsToHouse

nodes.documentation:
Constrctor function.
     * Assign contract owner (admin).
nodes.name: Devices
initializeContracts
register

nodes.documentation:
De-register device from this contract.
** caller must be the owner of the device.
     * @param deviceAddr The address of device to de-register. 
@return success Whether the registration was successful.
nodes.name: deRegister
addToHouse
removeFromHouse
editDevice
getDeviceInfo
verifyGuest

nodes.documentation: Self destruct.
nodes.name: kill
